short_summary: Editing Services for Visual Art Collection program
description: The [department] requires the services of an experienced Editor who is qualified to edit interpretive texts for museums and cultural institutions.
full_summary:
English Editing Services for Visual Art Collection Program
====================================================================

Request for Proposal (RFP) Announcement
-----------------------------------------

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for English editing services to support the Visual Art Collection (VAC) program. The selected contractor will provide editorial and revision writing expertise to ensure the accuracy, clarity, and accessibility of interpretive texts and materials for museums, cultural institutions, and the general public.

**RFP Details**
---------------

* RFP Title: English Editing Services for Visual Art Collection Program
* Reference Number: CB-7338-51728972
* Tender ID: 23-239439
* Publication Date: July 18, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: August 28, 2023 at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* Amendment Date: August 28, 2023

**Objective**
-------------

The contractor will provide high-quality editing services to ensure that interpretive texts and materials for the VAC program are:

* Accessible to the general public
* Readable and easy to understand
* Consistent in style and tone
* Free of errors and inaccuracies

**Key Requirements**
-------------------

* The contractor must have a strong background in English editing and revision services, with expertise in cultural interpretation and annotation.
* The contractor must be able to work independently and as part of a team to meet tight deadlines.
* The contractor must be able to communicate effectively with DFATD staff and stakeholders.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

The RFP is open to contractors who meet the eligible bidder requirements and are listed under one or more of the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For more information, please contact:

Assane Ndiaye
Email: [assane.ndiaye@international.gc.ca](mailto:assane.ndiaye@international.gc.ca)
